body_html:
@jcjohnson I've had CPU memory leaks associated with NVIDIA drivers + GPUs for years. I've never been able to pinpoint the problem precisely, and it only happens in some unfortunate configurations of things. However, I've stopped seeing them after the release CUDA 7.0 (and I was so glad!).
If you can repro this in a docker container, with a particular GPU + driver version, the NVIDIA team might have some actionable items.
